verses.verse: וַיַּקְהֵ֣ל <S%H6950><s%> together מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַ֛ת <S%H5712><s%> all the congregation בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> unto them These [are] the words אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <S%H6213><s%> that [ye] should do אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> Six יָמִים֮ <S%H3117><s%> days תֵּעָשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> be done מְלָאכָה֒ <S%H4399><s%> shall work וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> but on the seventh יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָכֶ֥ם קֹ֛דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> there shall be to you an holy day שַׁבַּ֥ת <S%H7676><s%> a sabbath שַׁבָּת֖וֹן <S%H7677><s%> of rest לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever הָעֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> whosoever doeth ב֛וֹ מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> work יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> therein shall be put to death

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְבַעֲר֣וּ <S%H1197><s%> Ye shall kindle אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> no fire בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> any מֹשְׁבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4186><s%> throughout your habitations בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <S%H7676><s%> upon the sabbath פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַ֥ת <S%H5712><s%> unto all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

קְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> Take מֵֽאִתְּכֶ֤ם <S%H853><s%> תְּרוּמָה֙ <S%H8641><s%> ye from among you an offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> whosoever נְדִ֣יב <S%H5081><s%> [is] of a willing לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> heart יְבִיאֶ֕הָ <S%H935><s%> let him bring אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> it an offering יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> and brass

וּתְכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> And blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> and fine linen וְעִזִּֽים׃ <S%H5795><s%> and goats'

וְעֹרֹ֨ת <S%H5785><s%> skins אֵילִ֧ם <S%H352><s%> And rams' מְאָדָּמִ֛ים <S%H119><s%> dyed red וְעֹרֹ֥ת <S%H5785><s%> skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <S%H8476><s%> and badgers' וַעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׂטִּֽים׃ <S%H7848><s%> and shittim

וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> And oil לַמָּא֑וֹר <S%H3974><s%> for the light וּבְשָׂמִים֙ <S%H1314><s%> and spices לְשֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <S%H4888><s%> for anointing וְלִקְטֹ֖רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense הַסַּמִּֽים׃ <S%H5561><s%> and for the sweet

וְאַ֨בְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> stones שֹׁ֔הַם <S%H7718><s%> And onyx וְאַבְנֵ֖י <S%H68><s%> and stones מִלֻּאִ֑ים <S%H4394><s%> to be set לָאֵפ֖וֹד <S%H646><s%> for the ephod וְלַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H2833><s%> and for the breastplate

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> And every wise לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> hearted בָּכֶ֑ם יָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> among you shall come וְיַעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> and make אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> all that the LORD

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֨מִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> The tabernacle אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אָהֳל֖וֹ <S%H168><s%> his tent וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִכְסֵ֑הוּ <S%H4372><s%> and his covering אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְרָסָיו֙ <S%H7165><s%> his taches וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְרָשָׁ֔יו <S%H7175><s%> and his boards אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיחָ֕ו <S%H1280><s%> his bars אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמֻּדָ֖יו <S%H5982><s%> his pillars וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדָנָֽיו׃ <S%H134><s%> and his sockets

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָרֹ֥ן <S%H727><s%> The ark וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּדָּ֖יו <S%H905><s%> and the staves אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכַּפֹּ֑רֶת <S%H3727><s%> thereof [with] the mercy seat וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> פָּרֹ֥כֶת <S%H6532><s%> and the vail הַמָּסָֽךְ׃ <S%H4539><s%> of the covering

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֻּׁלְחָ֥ן <S%H7979><s%> The table וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּדָּ֖יו <S%H905><s%> and his staves וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> and all his vessels וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> and the bread הַפָּנִֽים׃ <S%H6440><s%> of the Presence

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְנֹרַ֧ת <S%H4501><s%> The candlestick הַמָּא֛וֹר <S%H3974><s%> also for the light וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֵּלֶ֖יהָ <S%H3627><s%> and his furniture וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֵרֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H5216><s%> and his lamps וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֥מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with the oil הַמָּאֽוֹר׃ <S%H3974><s%> for the light

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֤ח <S%H4196><s%> altar הַקְּטֹ֙רֶת֙ <S%H7004><s%> And the incense וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּדָּ֔יו <S%H905><s%> and his staves וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <S%H4888><s%> and the anointing וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> קְטֹ֣רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense הַסַּמִּ֑ים <S%H5561><s%> and the sweet וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָסַ֥ךְ <S%H4539><s%> and the hanging הַפֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> for the door at the entering in לְפֶ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> the entrance הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle

אֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> The altar הָעֹלָ֗ה <S%H5930><s%> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for מִכְבַּ֤ר <S%H4345><s%> grate הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5178><s%> with his brasen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֔וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּדָּ֖יו <S%H905><s%> his staves וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> and all his vessels אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכִּיֹּ֖ר <S%H3595><s%> the laver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּנּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3653><s%> and his foot

אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> קַלְעֵ֣י <S%H7050><s%> The hangings הֶחָצֵ֔ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמֻּדָ֖יו <S%H5982><s%> his pillars וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדָנֶ֑יהָ <S%H134><s%> and their sockets וְאֵ֕ת <S%H853><s%> מָסַ֖ךְ <S%H4539><s%> and the hanging שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> for the door הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <S%H2691><s%> of the court

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִתְדֹ֧ת <S%H3489><s%> The pins הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִתְדֹ֥ת <S%H3489><s%> and the pins הֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵיתְרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4340><s%> and their cords

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> The cloths הַשְּׂרָ֖ד <S%H8278><s%> of service לְשָׁרֵ֣ת <S%H8334><s%> to do service בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֤י <S%H899><s%> garments הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> [place] the holy לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> for Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> and the garments בָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons לְכַהֵֽן׃ <S%H3547><s%> to minister in the priest's office

וַיֵּ֥צְא֛וּ <S%H3318><s%> departed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַ֥ת <S%H5712><s%> And all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses

וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose נְשָׂא֣וֹ <S%H5375><s%> stirred him up לִבּ֑וֹ <S%H3820><s%> heart וְכֹ֡ל <S%H3605><s%> and for all אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whose נָדְבָ֨ה <S%H5068><s%> made willing רוּח֜וֹ <S%H7307><s%> and every one whom his spirit אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> הֵ֠בִיאוּ <S%H935><s%> [and] they brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּרוּמַ֨ת <S%H8641><s%> offering יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S לִמְלֶ֨אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> to the work אֹ֤הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone עֲבֹ֣דָת֔וֹ <S%H5656><s%> and for all his service וּלְבִגְדֵ֖י <S%H899><s%> garments הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> and for the holy

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> men עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> both הַנָּשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> and women כֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> as many as נְדִ֣יב <S%H5081><s%> were willing לֵ֗ב <S%H3820><s%> hearted הֵ֠בִיאוּ <S%H935><s%> [and] brought חָ֣ח <S%H2397><s%> bracelets וָנֶ֜זֶם <S%H5141><s%> and earrings וְטַבַּ֤עַת <S%H2885><s%> and rings וְכוּמָז֙ <S%H3558><s%> and tablets כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> all jewels זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> so every אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הֵנִ֛יף <S%H5130><s%> that offered תְּנוּפַ֥ת <S%H8573><s%> [offered] an offering זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And every man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who נִמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> with whom was found אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> his possession תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> and fine linen וְעִזִּ֑ים <S%H5795><s%> and goats' וְעֹרֹ֨ת <S%H5785><s%> skins אֵילִ֧ם <S%H352><s%> of rams מְאָדָּמִ֛ים <S%H119><s%> [hair] and red וְעֹרֹ֥ת <S%H5785><s%> skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <S%H8476><s%> and badgers' הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> brought

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone מֵרִ֗ים <S%H7311><s%> Every one that did offer תְּר֤וּמַת <S%H8641><s%> an offering כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> of silver וּנְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and brass הֵבִ֕יאוּ <S%H935><s%> brought אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> offering יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S וְכֹ֡ל <S%H3605><s%> and every אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> who נִמְצָ֨א <S%H4672><s%> and every man with whom was found אִתּ֜וֹ <S%H854><s%> his possession עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֛ים <S%H7848><s%> shittim לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> for any work הָעֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> of the service הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> brought

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> And all the women חַכְמַת־ <S%H2450><s%> that were wise לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> hearted בְּיָדֶ֣יהָ <S%H3027><s%> with their hands טָו֑וּ <S%H2901><s%> did spin וַיָּבִ֣יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought מַטְוֶ֗ה <S%H4299><s%> that which they had spun אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <S%H8504><s%> [both] of blue וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <S%H713><s%> and of purple אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> scarlet וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ <S%H8336><s%> and of fine linen

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַ֨נָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> And all the women אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whose נָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> stirred לִבָּ֛ן <S%H3820><s%> whose heart אֹתָ֖נָה <S%H853><s%> בְּחָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> them up in wisdom טָו֖וּ <S%H2901><s%> spun אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִזִּֽים׃ <S%H5795><s%> goats'
